entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Oxtongue Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:37 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 11 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow at times heavy beginning late this evening. Local amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
